name: 樱雪集～Yuyuko's Butterfly Dream
description:
The game type is platform action included puzzle elements and roguelike content.
The story is Yuyuko enters a strange fairyland where she meets many odd monsters and mysterious travelers. In order to find out the secrets of the fairyland, Yuyuko begins her adventurous journey.ABOUT FAIRYLANDYuyuko,A ghost princess who has been dead for thousands of years, she has superpowers to induce death.
In a doze, she is lured to a mysterious place full of the breath of the underworld and creation.
And around the dead butterflies, recall a thousand years ago story...The game features :
  • intuitive action fight
  • Rich elements of puzzle
  • Multiple game ending
  • A variety of enemies
  • Exciting Boss Combat
  • Classic Japanese scenes
  • Touhou Project roles
  • Keep updating more content
